event.title: Informatica Big Data Edition Online Training
event.description:
Informatica Big Data Edition Training, Informatica Big Data Edition is a joint wander of Informatica Corp and Hortonworks. Informatica Big Data Edition establishes the framework of current information engineering with exemplary joining between ETL devices and Hadoop amazingly. The motivation behind Informatica Big Data Training is to ensure compelling extricating, changing, and stacking of information in Hadoop, that in its turn and in its trademark way has encouraged long haul storage of petabytes of information to an extraordinary outrageous.

About TekSlate:

TekSlate is the globally professional in IT courses training which emphasizes on hands-on experience with examples from real-time scenarios by experts. It is the largest provider of high-quality online training courses.

Key Features:

-Instructor-led Sessions
-Certified & Industry Expert Trainers
-Multiple Training Delivery Models
-Customize Course
-24/7 Live Expert Support
-Hands-On Experience
-Real-Time Case Studies
-Q&A and Assignments with Trainers
